message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"we; us (refers to the speaker and at least one other person)","sentence":"我们喜欢吃饭。","image_prompt":"Two people sitting at a table, happily eating rice together. The setting is simple and childlike, with clear visual focus on the two people (representing '我们') enjoying their meal. Soft apocalypse animation style: gentle colors, soft lines, and a quiet, dreamy atmosphere with subtle hints of a changed world outside the window.","sentence_translation":"We like to eat."}
